Constituent.Name: Total Organic Carbon
Constituent.Description: Total Organic Carbon Model for the Conterminous U.S. USGS OFR 2010-1276.

Source.Name: Agricultural Land
Source.Description: Area of row crops; small grains; fallow; pasture; and orchards-vineyards-other.

Source.Name: Urban Land
Source.Description: Area of low-intensity residential, high-intensity residential, and commercial-industrial-transportation land; urban-residential grasses.

Source.Name: Wetlands
Source.Description: Area of woody wetlands; emergent herbaceous wetlands.

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that the modeler has determined to be statistically significant. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. Agricultural Land Area of row crops; small grains; fallow; pasture; and orchards-vineyards-other. Deciduous Forest Area of deciduous forest. Evergreen Forest Area of evergreen forest. Mixed Forest Area of mixed forest. Urban Land Area of low-intensity residential, high-intensity residential, and commercial-industrial-transportation land; urban-residential grasses. Wetlands Area of woody wetlands; emergent herbaceous wetlands. Photosynthesis Photosynthesis in streams and reservoirs.
